responsibilities: We are seeking an experienced Data Engineer to join our client's team in Sydney on a contract basis. This is an excellent opportunity to work on cutting-edge data platforms and contribute to significant digital transformation initiatives.
requirements: Implement data quality frameworks and monitoring solutions
Develop and maintain documentation for data pipelines and processes
Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices
Troubleshoot and resolve data pipeline issues
Optimise query performance and database efficiency
Support BAU operations and incident management
